short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merge Cafe Game - Buy tasty cakes, merge them to unlock new recipes and serve them to cute falling customers!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start as a tea house and expand your range of fresh bakes. Filled with over 18 delectable bakery treats, from luxurious cookies to tasty chocolate cakes!


INTRODUCTION
Play Merge Cafe on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Merge Cafe extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Merge Cafe icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Merge Cafe popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Merge & win
